Text.val: 04.02.2013 SH SCR17678 I/O properties: Changed CharSet = UTF-8 back to Ansi
11.05.2011 SH SCR16446 Replaced table CURH by CUHA

SQL_STMT_U.val: select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, CAST ( sum(lgcc_amountc) AS DECIMAL ( 13,2)) from :1/lgcc where lgcc_ldgr_no = 2001000 and LGCC_DATE<='20060101' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=1 group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO

select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, CAST ( sum(lgcc_amountc) AS DECIMAL (13,2)) from :1/lgcc where lgcc_ldgr_no = 2003010 and LGCC_DATE<='20060101' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=1 group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO

select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, CAST ( sum(lgcc_amountc) AS DECIMAL (13,2)) from :1/lgcc where lgcc_ldgr_no = 2003020 and LGCC_DATE<='20060101' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=1 group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO

select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, CAST ( sum(lgcc_amountc) AS DECIMAL (13,2) ) from :1/lgcc where lgcc_ldgr_no = 2002020 and LGCC_DATE<='20060101' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=1 group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO

select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, CAST ( sum(lgcc_amountc) AS DECIMAL (13,2)) from :1/lgcc where lgcc_ldgr_no = 2002010 and LGCC_DATE<='20060101' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=1 group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO

select LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO, CAST ( sum(lgcc_amountc) AS DECIMAL ( 13,2)) from :1/lgcc where lgcc_ldgr_no = 2002030 and LGCC_DATE<='20060101' and LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_ADMNO=1 group by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO order by LGCC_ACCC_ACCT_CLNTNO
